backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of Designation By-law 72-2023 - 505 Balliol Street

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 72-2023 to designate 505 Balliol Street (Don Valley West, Ward 15) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 72-2023 - To designate the property at 505 Balliol Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

subheading: IN THE MATTER OF THE ONTARIO HERITAGE ACT R.S.O. 1990 CHAPTER 0.18 AND 505 BALLIOL STREET CITY OF TORONTO, PROVINCE OF ONTARIO
title: Notice of Passing of Designation By-law 72-2023 - 505 Balliol Street
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
